title: Hydrology & Water Management
description: Hydrological datasets including flood events, irrigation/management features, and historical water infrastructure for Kansas. Sources include NOAA, FEMA, and USDM.

endpoints.notes: NOAA Storm Events, FEMA disaster declarations, and US Drought Monitor provide flood/irrigation event data.

provenance: Datasets compiled from NOAA Storm Events, FEMA declarations, USDA/USDM, and state water management agencies.

contacts.name: NOAA National Centers for Environmental Information

notes: Planned integration into STAC Items and hydrology viewer layers; flood scenario modeling to use MCP SOPs (HEC-RAS).
